title: ACTION SANDBOX
description: A physics sandbox game for people who like to play with digital toys. Create, control toys and define your goals. If you’re not too great at construction – don’t worry You can just change the developer’s sample to suit your taste. Walk, shoot, fly, catch, board, hang, stab, hit, operation, spawn, dance, robotics, transform. Arrive, escape, rescue, survival, kill, destroy, competition with AI, docking. You can also download, play, modify, and recreate other player’s toys. People Playground

system_requirements.Graphics: DirectX® 10 compliant graphics card and driver
